of regular er  and ir verbs see  Estructura 33 p 96 empezar eie volver oue  In many verbs such as empezar to begin  the stem vowel changes from e to ie    Note that the nosotrosas and vosotrosas forms dont have a stem change  INFINITIVE VERB STEM STEM CHANGE CONJUGATED FORM  empezar empez empiez empiezo   volver volv vuelv vuelvo   In many other verbs such as volver to return  the stem vowel changes from   o to ue The nosotrosas and vosotrosas forms have no stem change   To help you identify stemchanging verbs they will appear as follows  throughout the text 42 Stemchanging verbs  eie oue Stemchanging verbs deviate from the normal pattern of regular verbs  Note the spelling changes to the stem in the conjugations below Singular forms  yo vuelvo  t vuelves  Udlella vuelve Plural forms  nosotrosas volvemos  vosotrosas volvis  Udsellosellas vuelven Singular forms  yo empiezo  t empiezas  Udlella empieza Plural forms  nosotrosas empezamos  vosotrosas empezis  Udsellosellas empiezan Los chicos empiezan  a hablar de su visita  al cenote Ellos vuelven a comer  en el restaurante The verb empezar eie to begin The verb volver oue to return CONSULTA ANTE TODO Tutorial 128 Leccin 4ciento
